attributes.action: Enforce a compolsury driving test for people over the age of 70 every 5 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: OAP's are just as much a threat to our raods as young drivers. We force young drivers to take a test, so OAPs should eb forced to take one to ensure they meet the standard required, as standards change over time.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
